about_the_game:
Help Randal, Matt, and Charlie solve a ghoulish mystery that haunts their university in this old-school point-and-click adventure.

Much like the A-team, our ‘heroes’ are accused of committing a heinous crime they didn’t commit. The story begins with them testifying before an angry student council demanding answers about the incident. Here, each of our main characters will share their side of the story, narrating the game’s plot through flashbacks; however, at certain points, the story will return to the present. There will be connections to Randal’s Monday, but don’t worry—you don’t need to play that game to understand and fully enjoy this plot. We want to emphasize this point.

Three boneheads under your command: This time, you’ll control three different characters (Randal, Matt, and Charlie). Each will have access to unique locations, items, skills, and dialogue options, specific to each of them. A plot that delivers: The story jumps from one character to another, with plenty of flashbacks and surprises saved for the home stretch. If you enjoy surreal humor and unexpected plot twists, this game is for you. A college vibe: Want to chug from a beer keg while doing a handstand? Cheat on a test? Go to a toga party? Beat some nerds in a role-playing game? Take someone to the spring ball? Overcome the toughest trials to join an exclusive fraternity? Then you belong here.

Nerdy collectibles: The campus is overflowing with items to collect. You’ll also find bootleg copies of epic games like Last Fantasy VII and Plastic Gear Solid. These collectibles will be added to a list for you to check anytime. Find them all, and there’s an additional surprise waiting for you.
